macro_xzqMA4vF.name: human_readable_number
macro_xzqMA4vF.description: this macro a number into human approximate readable number ex. 14,001 -> 14K, 1,034,430 -> 1M and so on

propertiesFile.name: macros
propertiesFile.content:
---
version: 2
macros:
- name: "human_readable_number"
  description: "this macro a number into human approximate readable number ex. 14,001\
    \ -> 14K, 1,034,430 -> 1M and so on"
  arguments:
  - name: "number"
    type: "unknown"
  macroType: "expression"

macros.name: human_readable_number
macros.description: this macro a number into human approximate readable number ex. 14,001 -> 14K, 1,034,430 -> 1M and so on
